Just had an amazing dinner here! Fast, friendly service.  The food is abundant and delicious.  Definitely try the traditional ham and cheese Argentinian pastry.  The salads were very large and very fresh.  No skimpiness here.  The steaks are huge, flavorful, and oh, so tender!  My husband's steak was cooked to perfection, just how he wanted it.  I like mine very, very well done.  When it came it was a little too rare for my taste.  When I asked that they cook it a bit more, the request was graciously accepted and taken care of.  The steak came back wonderful.  And the staff checked several times to be sure it was to my liking.  This was my favorite dinner in Barcelona.  I highly recommend this restaurant - particularly to Americans who are just a little tired of tapas.
